thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Pat Jackson

author: Pat Jackson
title: Pat Jackson
text: Make sure you know the level of experience required for your task. Simple lifting, moving of heavy materials, basic labouring or a courier job does not require any particular expertise except physical ability to do the task. Painting, carpentry or precision use of tools you will require a higher level of ability - make sure you ask for the right level of assistance. I was more than happy with the outcome of the job I posted and will be sure to recommend to my friends.
